Author: G888#0307
Content: I have found in shopping for visa's its more important to consider their visa treaties, and taxation secondarily. Once you are outside USA tax jurisdiction - ie have renounced your citizenship - numerous (legal) tax avoidance options become available. Besides - even retaining us citizenship the right foundations and trusts can shield 100% of tax liability

Author: G888#0307
Content: visa treaties - for those not familiar - are more important for non-eu countries, like carribean islands. St Kitts for example has strong visa treaties (travel rights with other nations)
